Message:
We’ll form a circus troupe
right here in Fran.
One that’s even more
mesmerizing and fun-filled
than the one back home!

With that decided,
we needed to start recruiting
troupemates right away.
Just me and Flack wouldn’t cut it.

Hmm~
We’ll definitely need music...
Milla can handle that.

And then we’ll need a dancer...
That’s Hathor for sure!

I started reaching out to the girls
I had already set my sights on.
Thankfully, everyone seemed
down to join~!

We were set to have our
first performance in three days
at the city square.

Alright, let’s blow everyone away
with the best show ever!
